The video was published on Instagram on: 2020, and has been viewed more than 9,000 times.
The video shows Michael Schnedlitz: a member of the Freedom Party of Austria, applying Coca-Cola directly to a rapid antigen test in the Austrian National Council on December 10, 2020, in an attempt to prove the test's unreliability in detecting COVID-19.
Dialab: the manufacturer of the rapid antigen test, posted a video on December 12, 2020, showing a properly executed test with Coca-Cola, which returned a negative result. The company emphasized the importance of conducting tests correctly and by trained individuals to avoid misleading results.
